price: 74. Balobi: Tokutaki bankoko na biso ya kala bazali sé ndenge wana.
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qālū bal wajadnā ābāanā kadhālika yafʿalūna
